name: Carry-Sort Game
description:
Mouse: Move

[Q][E]: Rotate

[SPACE]: Start/Restart current level

[ESCAPE]: Restart the game

  • The game's goal is to take Dango home;
  • You can carry more Dangoes at a time;
  • You can not carry Dangoes with different color at a time.

Zhengbang Wang: Programmer, Designer

Kunyu Wang: Core Mechanic Designer, Programmer
